    [Image] or [Truncated image[            Bcol      Ecol
L1
    ["]                                     1         2
    [This string contains a subexpressi[    2         39
    [$(]                                    39        41
    [$subExprVat]                           41        52

    [with an inner expandable string ]      56        88

    [ which has more variables]             127       152
